item.description:
We've been to this place before, it had a good atmosphere, the menu was okay, and the food was good. On Tuesday they offer a ﻿﻿﻿﻿$5:00 Sirloin steak dinner-all day! The meal comes with mashed potatoes and onion straws. For $5 dollars who could pass on this, hope to see you there!

FYI: They have Keno and a Juke Box!

Their web address is as follows: http://www.icechestbar.com/
item.how_to_find_us: You cant miss us, but if you do, call 508-958-2353 and i'll be the one with the ringing phone ;)

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: $5.00 Sirloin Steak Dinner
